channel.title: React & Gatsby shop powered by Snipcart
channel.description: A snipcart's demo using React and Gatsby.

item.title: Fireworks
item.description: Fireworks are a noble, traditional way to emphasize the greatness of an event. They command the epic. They are poetry in a dark night sky…
item.content:encoded: Fireworks are a noble, traditional way to emphasize the greatness of an event. They command the epic. They are poetry in a dark night sky. They look good, smell strong, and are dangerous to play with. A bit like secret agents.

item.title: Bow Ties
item.description: The bow-tie (not to be confused with the tae bo) is an aphrodisiac worn by male humans attempting to win one or more mates. According to…
item.content:encoded: The bow-tie (not to be confused with the tae bo) is an aphrodisiac worn by male humans attempting to win one or more mates. According to scientists (many of whom sport the style regularly), the bow-tie has been clinically proven to yield positive results. These findings were confirmed by the surge in popularity of the ties in the 1960’s which led to a nation-wide public school banning. (source)

item.title: Dry Martini
item.description: “One Martini is all right. Two are too many, and three are not enough.”
item.content:encoded: “One Martini is all right. Two are too many, and three are not enough.”
